When generating PR titles/descriptions:
- Title: imperative, â‰¤72 chars, include scope if relevant.
- If available, prefix with JIRA IDs, e.g.: `[SSIAG-339] Feature: brief description`.
- Body sections (Markdown): Overview, What changed, Why, How to test, Risk & Rollback, Checklist.
- Link issues (GitHub keywords), list breaking changes, and migration notes if any.
